website_summaries.verdict: Great for meal replacements, this vegan protein powder contains 2 servings of fruits and vegetables per scoop.
pros: Blend of hemp, pea, quinoa, and chia proteins
2 servings of fruit and veg per serving
Smooth powder doesn't get gritty or chalky
cons: Expensive for the amount that you get

customer_reviews.title: This is a great base for a smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I loathe fake sugars and fake tastes. This is a great base for a smoothie. I would NOT drink it plain (a little plant-y), but with a bit of fruit, it's fabulous. It's so hard to find a protein shake that's not flavored. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: review98

customer_reviews.title: Sourced from around the world
customer_reviews.text: I want a powder that is sourced only from the USA. The ingredients in here are sourced from around the world. Goji could be from China. I tried this 4 days and it gave me a headache each time and also some trouble sleeping! The detox and digest one gave me a tight sore throat-so only used that 1 day. Threw them both out-afraid of allergic reaction possibly from dandelion root which is connected to ragweed, and the other one too-because I love good sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer💫

customer_reviews.title: Greatest of AMAZING GRASS products in Protein line.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Amazing Grass Original simple because it does NOT have the stevia sweetner in it, like all their other protein products. The only real draw back is the extreme cost of this. Ends up being $50 for same amount as their Protein with stevia, in large size.. at $34. So weight the difference in cost verses taste. Why this stevia thing has taken the market must be same as why palm oil has crawled right back into every snack and food product in the world. It is CHEAP to use. Saves the companies Moooooooneeeeeeey! ( as Kevin 'the cold hearted capitalist' O'Leary would say).
customer_reviews.author: Lee T. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best dairy free protein available!
customer_reviews.text: I just had my fourth baby. I learned early on that my babies don't tolerate me drinking dairy while nursing. I have had to give up dairy every time. I love protein shakes but have never found a dairy free protein that I can enjoy while nursing.... until now. I was skeptical after trying so many over the years but this is awesome. No weird flavor added to my shakes and no weird consistency. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Elise

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vegan protein. I blend it with water and a banana, it is so delicious!! Have bought it a few times , and have tried others but none come close to this one as far as taste, low calorie count, and high protein. Will definitely buy again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: $25 for TWELVE servings is INSANE! I wish I would’ve saw that detail before purchasing. The greens I usually get is $35 FOR ONE HUNDRED servings.. they were sold out or I would have never bought elsewhere to begin with. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein powder so far...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many protein powder, but I really like this one because it blends well with other ingredients such bananas, berries and oat milk. I really like the plain flavor over the flavored ones because if you add more ingredients , it tends to be too sweet. Great buy....
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Stevia Free
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few vegan protein powders but keep coming back to this one. I personally do not like stevia (or any other added sweeteners/flavors) that so many products on the market have, the original flavor is stevia free and taste great. I add my own naturally sweet fruit to my smoothies and do not taste the powder at all and prefer the 'natural' taste of the smoothie. However, I do agree with other reviewers regarding the limited amount of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in a smoothie!
customer_reviews.text: The amazing grass Protein Superfood mix is fantastic when mixed in a fruit smoothie. I like to mix mine with a frozen tropical fruit blend, half a banana, a handful of fresh spinach, a 6 oz can of pineapple-orange juice and a splash of water. Don’t try this mix with just water. It is gross if not mixed with fruit/juice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cox

customer_reviews.title: Protein Drink with No Stevia
customer_reviews.text: My favorite protein shake powder. I dislike shakes that use stevia to sweeten the flavor. Whole Foods associate told me about this powder a few years ago. I drink it when I cannot make my own protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: GVLchick29607

customer_reviews.title: YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes terrible. Tried it in smoothies to hide the awful flavor, but it overwhelms whatever it mixes with. Buy this if you like the taste of moist dirt. You have been advised. Five star reviews are very suspicious- this crap actually tastes like the inside of a garbage can smells.
customer_reviews.author: DRBROOK

customer_reviews.title: NO STEVIA
customer_reviews.text: I HATE stevia. I hate it so much. It took some time to find a product like the without stevia. Why do you all need stevia??? Tastes great in my smoothies, super filling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty boost of protein for vegetarians and others
customer_reviews.text: I mix this powder with a combination of cran-grape and orange juice. It mixes rapidly with a few seconds of stirring. The combination of the texture of the powder with the tanginess of the juices wakes me up and is a great accompaniment for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Grimwood

customer_reviews.title: It taste like fish food
customer_reviews.text: This smells and tastes like fish food. I think this could be a drink only if you really need to drink it, but definitely not something I enjoy. It has some fishlike taste that I can't stand.
customer_reviews.author: ROLANDO PEREZ RETANA

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The original formula tastes great. Almost like vanilla ice cream. I cannot speak to it's efficacy (I used it for the first time today) but it pleases the palate.
customer_reviews.author: King Kong

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the original so I could play around with different flavors. I blended 1/2 scoop of the powder in 8 oz water with one banana and 3/4 cup frozen pineapple chunks and it is amazing! Next time I might add a few ice cubes to make it thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cox

customer_reviews.title: Useful when Quasi Fasting
customer_reviews.text: This particular formula contains the protein I seek. A rich, creamy banana-strawberry-nut butter of choice smoothie with a high protein soy milk base is a great female drink.
customer_reviews.author: HC Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I really am grateful for this superior product and that it does NOT contain stevia! Thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: DesertDweller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to digest
customer_reviews.text: The only protein I am able to digest is eggs so I eat a lot of eggs. I am thrilled to find a protein powder that works for me. I use about 2 T plus some of the Chocolate Supergreen food with frozen straberries. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong flavor that might take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is something that surprised me. I thought I ordered Vanilla, but actually got Original. Not my most favorite flavor and hard to take down by itself, but I'm growing used to the taste. Sometimes I'll add a sweetener or matcha to help with the flavor. I haven't noticed a difference in terms of protein/muscle building compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Non-Chatty-Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I’ve tried a couple of greens and this one is by far superior. I use it in my shakes in the morning and I can’t even taste it.
customer_reviews.author: LaynaBell14

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews prior to ordering. While I understand some settling, this is ridiculous and a waste of plastic. It's less than half a can. Even if I shake it to "fluff" it up, it's still only half a can. The size of the can is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: MCM

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stuff because the ingredients list is amazing and the taste isn't bad but it made me stick to my stomach almost like I had food poisoning. I won't be using this product again.
customer_reviews.author: missgigi0220

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies your grass cravings
customer_reviews.text: Waking up at 3am with grass cravings? You need this stuff in your cabinet. Two scoops in a glass of water will have you dreaming you're a well-manicured lawn in no time.
customer_reviews.author: argiope

customer_reviews.title: Taste like basic pea protein
customer_reviews.text: Taste like basic pea protein. What does pea protein taste like? It taste horrible. You're better off just eating your vegetables/fruit (or even blending it yourself) than in-taking this concoction. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Homie

customer_reviews.title: This is the best flavor in this family of products
customer_reviews.text: No artificial sweeteners, and the taste and texture are non invasive. I add to brewed chai tea if I want additional flavor and no extra calories. This is the best flavor in this family of products, imo. Better than the chocolate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power up your smoothie without Stevia
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t change the original flavor. It’s a perfect addition for smoothies. I love that is the only flavor that has no Stevia so I can add a banana to make it sweet and add the flavors I like naturally, e.g cocoa powder, peanut butter, strawberries, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the two main protein powders I use as a vegan, and it works well for me, especially since the unflavored version doesn't contain any stevia, sucralose, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cartridge Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is not easy to drink. Normally I like natural green flavors and I love most amazing grass.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder because I dislike all the fake ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder because I dislike all the fake stuff in most protein powder. Even the flavor of stevia grosses me out. I will say this does have an earthy taste that you need to overcome by mixing it with fruit and juice but it makes a great smoothie for breakfast. Blends great! No grittiness.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Quick on the go protein
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for after exercising. I like to blend it with vegetable juice for a quick, on the go, pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Smells like Matcha. Great addition to my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Miriah

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this product. I eat the plain no flavor & it’s smooth and taste good. I add blueberries or mango and 2 cups of spinach. Can’t go without it!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome that it has no added sweeteners (actually - the others all sneak them in). Taste is great just mix it in a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Protein Superfood style one tastes great in a smoothie and provides a ton of protein and nutrients in just one scoop!
customer_reviews.author: amandimal

customer_reviews.title: One of my top choices for plant-based protein drinks
customer_reviews.text: It’s my favorite of the protein powders I’ve tried. Good flavor by itself that makes a thick drink although I do sometimes buy the hemp powder instead to support the hemp farmers.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazing Grass!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love Amazing Grass products! I use this daily in my AM/PM smoothies. Decent taste and keeps you feeling energized for hours.
customer_reviews.author: R&RG

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the salad flavor it conjures up for me also how well it keeps me feeling full after my gym workouts.
customer_reviews.author: mahdokht nili

customer_reviews.title: My labs are wonderful, well managed with greens in this wonderful product and discipline too.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but do not want on a auto purchase due to travel.I have well managed
customer_reviews.author: Darlene visiting Oregon snow mou tai s for the holidays from Hawaii.

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Simply gross. It was disgusting and I am usually down.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki d

customer_reviews.title: Product expired
customer_reviews.text: Product expired 3.5 months before. Won't order this product from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Ares

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It doesn't mess with my digestive system like so many protein powders, I love that it has superfoods in it, and that it's not horribly expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Gross & gritty
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting Wish I could get my money back Worst flavor ever
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein powder! I use it with almond milk and it's perfect, "the original" flavor is not sweet which is what I was looking for. When I want it sweet I'll add a banana and a teaspoon of cacao, its tastes delicious. The only downside is when I receive these powders the containers are only halfway full, I feel a little ripped off especially since this protein powder is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good. Was looking for a protein prefer that ...
customer_reviews.text: Fills me up for a long time . Taste pretty good . Was looking for a protein prefer that doesn't taste fake and sweet and this is best so far.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes like what you may think "organic" sounds like it would taste... Had to add lots of fruit and other ingredients to make it palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie n Laura Long

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I guess its good. I just really hate the texture of protein
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Adds a distinct flavor and thickness to my daily smoothie. The perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition.
customer_reviews.text: I make a smoothie every morning with this product and it taste good and is nutritionists
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is NOT sweet and NO artificial sweetener added.
customer_reviews.author: Wenman LIU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only protein powder that is not chalky. Blends well with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Barber

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and great product
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a rice protein product that was really good, but they added Stevia to their ingredients and I did not want that. This stuff is very awesome. It works great with my homemade blended whole juices.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: The nutritional benefits are amazing; however
customer_reviews.text: The nutritional benefits are amazing; however, I felt like I was going to throw up every time I drank this. The taste is awful :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. I guess I didn't thoroughly read the label because it is VANILLA flavored which it does NOT say on the front "original" flavor. If you look at ingredients listed there is vanilla listed (in small print) but they don't tell you that up front. I do not care for vanilla and no matter what I try to mix this with it tastes awful and the vanilla is overpowering. I wanted an "original" plant based green protein without vanilla flavor. I will go back to just wheat grass. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Scout

customer_reviews.title: My go-to for a quick,  nutrition filled breakfast
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nutritional protein powder by far. Organic, 20g protein, and no sweetener (stevia) in the original flavor.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: but I liked
customer_reviews.text: Taste is very vegetable-y, not for everyone, but I liked it
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Taste like the jolly green giant spit in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: This taste horrible- I made a smoothie with banana, soy milk, chia seeds, and one scoop of the unflavored protein. The texture is so chalky and gritty, and the flavor is reminiscent of fresh cut grass
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my trainer as part of my workout plan. I have to say the label makes the ingredients look awesome, and I'm sure it's healthy, but man this stuff tastes horrible. I tried mixing with water, almond milk, coconut milk, and in a smoothie with other fruits hoping it would help the flavor. I could not choke this stuff down.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Original is so so nasty
customer_reviews.text: I tried the original hoping to mix it in with my green smoothies but even a tiny amount of this tastes SO BAD I can't stand it. It's seriously disgusting. Foul. Like eating grass hay mixed with dirt.
customer_reviews.author: concerned consumer

customer_reviews.title: Half full container
customer_reviews.text: Really unhappy when I opened the container the see it half full..
customer_reviews.author: lisa darling

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious protein option without the whey side effects. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious protein, but they increased the pricing in the last month so it's not worth it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: mk_d

customer_reviews.title: If you like eating grass clippings, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.text: My first reaction: It tastes like grass clippings. I can now say I've tried it, and it was disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jessie

product_meta.title: Amazing Grass Protein Superfood: Vegan Protein Powder, All in One Nutrition Shake, Unflavored, 12 Servings
product_meta.description: Style:Small TubsProtein Superfood The Original is an organic, all-in-one nutritional protein shake that thoughtfully combines our farm fresh greens with nutrient-dense fruits and veggies plus plant-based protein from organic pea, chia, hemp and quinoa. Each serving contains 20g of complete protein, 7 alkalizing greens and 2 full servings of fruits and veggies to promote lean muscle, satisfy hunger and provide nourishing energy. With a smooth flavor and satisfying texture, this superfood combo is a convenient way to get the whole food nutrition your body needs with an amazing flavor your taste buds will love. At Amazing Grass our roots run deep...Back to our family farm in Kansas, where for over 3 generations Amazing Grass has organically grown & harvested the most nutrient-dense greens on earth. Today, we thoughtfully craft our greens with the highest quality, plant-based ingredients curated from like-minded farmers from around the world. Amazing Grass products are a delicious way to nourish your body with the whole food nutrition it needs to feel amazing every day.
feature_bullets: All-in-one nutritional protein shake with 20g complete protein from organic pea protein, organic quinoa, organic hemp protein & chia.
7 alkalizing greens, 9 nutrient-dense fruits and vegetables, 4 carbs, less than 1g of sugar, 3g of fiber.
2 full servings of fruits and vegetables per serving. Alfalfa, Spirulina, Chlorella, and Acai.
USDA Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Dairy-Free, Grain-Free. Can be used for pre workout and post workout as each serving promotes lean muscle and aids in digestion
Add one scoop to 12 Oz or more to your beverage of choice, craft the ultimate smoothie or add to your favorite muffin, cake, cookie or brownie recipe.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
